recipesJson.name: BIG RED’S KUSTARD KILLZZ “VANILLA” (LOW DAPP VERSTION
recipesJson.author: BigRed
recipesJson.description: If you want really low dab I suggest using French vanilla v2 but you can use festoon one to make it a bit more dappy . witch is what i do when i use vanilla custard v2 so it’s not too low on the dap lol . I will post my original FULL DAP version next .
